ingredients: 2 pounds any firm fish fillets, such as salmon, catfish, or swordfish, about 3/4-inch thick, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 to 3 fresh green chili pepper, such as serrano, stemmed
1 to 3 dried red chili pepper, such as chile de arbol, broken into pieces
7 to 8 fresh green curry leaves, lightly crumpled
